text: Me: Look! There is my favorite show on the telly!
Me: When I was a little reptile, I loved to eat my worm-flakes while watching [i]Roving Reptiles[/i].
What was your favorite?
Me: What was your favorite hero of the [i]Roving Reptiles[/i]?
Date: Oh, wow! I also loved this as a child.
Date: My favorite was always Tom the Turtle. He was just so nice and chill. And yours?
The strong Iguana!
The clever Snake!
The lazy Lizard
silence
Me: Igor the Iguana!
Me: I love Igor the Iguana, he is so strong.
Me: He can punch everyone!
Me: Susan the Snake!
Me: She always impressed me by figuring out a solution for everything.
Me: Lina the Lizard!
Me: She was enjoying the easy life but always saved the day with wise hints.
Me: My...what...?
Date: Hm... I think he was pretty boring...
Date: Being strong is not really fun and pretty standard.
Date: Oh, yes! She was my sisters favorite too.
Date: A real smartass. Hihi.
My sister.
silence
Me: I also have a sister.
Me: But she is more like Lina the lazy Lizard, hehe.
Me: Ouch! Ugh...
Date: Hihi, I also like Lina very much!
Date: Remember when she won in hide and seek because she fell asleep on the toilet?
My sister did that!
silence
Me: Hehe, yes. Thas was so funny!
Me: She also reminds me very much of my sister.
Me: I swear, that happened to her too, when we were kids, hehe.
Me: Toilet...?
Date: I guess you're not really interested...
Date: Hihi, she sounds nice.
Date: Maybe I will meet her one day.
Date: Than we can all be lazy and witty together. Hihi.
Date: Whaaaaat? Hihi!
Date: Now I really need to meet her!
Date: She sounds so fun!
